name="returnAssignedProductNumber" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The assign number from the original order of the item that is being returned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="returnReasonCode" type="pcp:returnReasonCodeType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="returnReasonSubTypeCode" type="pcp:returnReasonSubTypeCodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="returnReasonOutOfPolicyUserName" type="pcp:returnReasonOutOfPolicyUserNameType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="returnAuthorisationNumber" type="pcp:returnAuthorisationNumberType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="returnNotes" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Free text field containing reason for return (order level).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="replacementPolicyId" type="pcp:replacementPolicyIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="replacementPolicySOACode" type="pcp:replacementPolicyCodeType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="vatDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="vatRate" type="xsd:double"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Value Added Tax (VAT) rate.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="vatAmount" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Value Added Tax (VAT) amount. In pence, therefore 500 equates to 5.00.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="vatExclusivePrice" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The individual cost of the saleable product. This is the cost to the customer excluding VAT but including any discounts. In pence, therefore 500 equates to 5.00.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="vatReversalReceiptStatus" type="pcp:vatReversalReceiptStatusType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="recurringPaymentDetails_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Details of the recurring payment applicable to the Order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="existingAccount" type="mod:existingAccount_3Type"/> <xsd:element name="newAccount" type="mod:newAccount_3Type"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="newAccount_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Create a new Billing account to associate the order to.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="billingAccountNumber" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The billing account number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="billingCustomerNumber" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Geneva customeraccount number as known to Geneva.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="accountRecurringPaymentDetails" type="mod:accountRecurringPaymentDetails_3Type"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="accountRecurringPaymentDetails_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The account recurring payment can either be made using a credit card or direct debit.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="accountContinuousCCAuthority" type="mod:accountContinuousCCAuthorityType"/> <xsd:element name="accountDirectDebitDetails" type="mod:accountDirectDebitDetailsType"/> <xsd:element name="continuousChequePayments" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A single 'Y' character identifying that the customer is going to make recurring payments by cheque.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="accountContinuousCCAuthorityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This field contains bank information used if the continuous payments will be made by Credit Card.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cardNumber" type="xcore:cardNumberType"/> <xsd:element name="cardExpiryDate" type="xcore:cardExpiryDateType"/> <xsd:element name="cardHolderName" type="xcore:cardHolderNameType"/> <xsd:element name="cardIssueDate" type="xcore:cardIssueDateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cardIssueNumber" type="xcore:cardIssueNumberType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="postCode" type="xcore:postcodeType"/> <xsd:element name="houseNameOrNumber" type="pcp:houseNameOrNumber" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cardType" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of the card used (Debit or Credit).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="existingAccount_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Details of the recurring payment applicable to the Order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="billingAccountNumber" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The billing account number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="billingCustomerNumber" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Geneva customeraccount number as known to Geneva.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="revisedDirectDebitDetails" type="mod:revisedDirectDebitDetailsType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="revisedDirectDebitDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains an update to the Direct Debit payment details for the Billing Account.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="userAccountNumber" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The raw user-entered bank account number, i.e. this is their bank account number as far as the customer is concerned. Stored in encrypted format.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="bankAccountNumber" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The transcribed bank account number in BACS format, i.e. this value is returned by the Mod Check in Barron McCann. Stored in encrypted format.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="bankSortCode" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Bank Account sort code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="bankAccountName" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer name defined on the Bank Account.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="initialPaymentDetails_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is for any additonal charges that have already been taken. For example for additional hardware charges.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cardDetails" type="mod:cardDetails_3Type"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="paymentDetails" type="mod:paymentDetails_3Type"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="paymentReferenceNumber" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unique identifier provided by the payment service provider.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="cardToken" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Card token that can be used to retrieve card details Card token that can be used to retrieve card details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="externalPaymentId" type="pcp:externalPaymentIdType" minOccurs="0"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="billingAccountNumber" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The billing account number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="paymentMoney" type="pcp:paymentMoneyType"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="paymentDetails_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the payment result returned by the Payment entity.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="authorisationStatus" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The result of an authorisation. Meaning is 2 = Declined, 5 = Referred, 6 = Authorised, 0, 1, 3 and 4 = Not Done. Historically '-1' = Processed Before. Maps to EAI OIP DB ORDER.AUTH_STATUS.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="authorisationRespCode" type="pcp:authorisationRespCodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="authorisationRespMessage" type="pcp:authorisationRespMessageType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="authorisationCode" type="pcp:authorisationCodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="authMessage" type="pcp:authMessageType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="buynetId" type="pcp:buynetIdType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="settlementRespCode" type="xsd:short" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Code between the numbers 000 913. If this code is null, the settle has not been performed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="cardDetails_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Bank Card details</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cardNumber" type="xcore:maskedCardNumberType"/> <xsd:element name="cardExpiryDate" type="xcore:cardExpiryDateType"/> <xsd:element name="cardHolderName" type="xcore:cardHolderNameType"/> <xsd:element name="cardIssueDate" type="xcore:cardIssueDateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cardIssueNumber" type="xcore:cardIssueNumberType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="postCode" type="xcore:postcodeType"/> <xsd:element name="houseNameOrNumber" type="pcp:houseNameOrNumber" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="bankCardIssuer" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Textual description of the card issuer - e.g. MAESTRO, SOLO, VISA, DELTA, AMEX.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="orderReturnDetails_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order level Returns details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="returnsOutstanding" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Flag indicating whether or not there are outstanding returns on an order (Y/N). Field will be N if no returns have been requested.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="returnReason" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reason for return, this is the high level return reason for example the code for Change of mind.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="returnNotes" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Free text field containing reason for return (order level).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="orderSourceDetails_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Details of whom and from where the order originated.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="orderMethod" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The following are the allowed values: RT Retail TS Telesales OL Online (default) IA IT</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="partner" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="owningBusinessDivision" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>O2 Business that own the order Either O2UK or O2ONLINE.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="sourceOfSale" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies a sales channel, online, RFE, ESME etc.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="retailerId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Retailer ID of the retailer taking the order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="posBusinessUnit" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Point of Sale business unit.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="storeName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the store as known to Telefonica.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="storeType" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of store. Either O2, O2 Franchise or Independent.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="salesPerson" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An identifier for the person who made the sale.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="salesManager" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Sales Person's manager.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="csaId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Used to identify the initiator of an activity, ususally a CSAs Id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="userAlias" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identity of the user that placed the order, could be CSA Id, the customer portal username or Unspecified.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="callContactID" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier to associate a customer contact message (within the customer Contact system) with actions taken in other systems such as placing new orders.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="callTypeIndicator" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicates if an order is a (OUTBOUND=pro-active or INBOUND=reactive) order, used for commisions/retention.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="proofs" type="mod:proofs_3Type" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="proofs_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Proofs of Address and Identity provided by the customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="proofOfAddress" type="mod:proofOfAddressType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="proofOfIdentity" type="mod:proofOfIdentityType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="proofOfAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Proof Of Address information provided by the Customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="proofType" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of Proof Of Address information provided by the Customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="proofData" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date the Proof Of Address was issued. e.g. Date on a Utility Bill.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="proofOfIdentityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of Proof Of Identity information provided by the Customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="proofType" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of Proof Of Address information provided by the Customer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="proofData" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date the Proof Of Address was issued. e.g. Date on a Utility Bill.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="orderHeaderDetails_3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Holds the identifies and run date for the order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="orderNumber" type="pcp:orderNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The External Order Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="oid" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The internal order id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orderTimestamp" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date and time the order was created in the source system.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orderType" type="pcp:orderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The following are the different order types, NE - New Order RE - Replacement UG - Upgrade ES - ESME sales order EC - ESME change request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orderStatus" type="pcp:orderStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Describes the status of order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="linkedOrderNum" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="preOrderOfferingId" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The PreOrder Offering ID.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="portalEmail" type="mod:portalEmailType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Portal details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="mostRecentOrderEvent" type="mod:mostRecentOrderEventType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The last order event held against the Order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orderCollectionVerificationLevel" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The level of Identification and Verification required.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="portalEmailType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="commonRegistryUserName" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique identifier for the user.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="commonRegistryUserDomain" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the common registry domain name for the user.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="mostRecentOrderEventType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="orderEvent" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Description of order status.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orderEventDescription" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>User friendly description of the order event.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="confirmOrderPayment_1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The confirmation of the order is based on the ordernumber and channel provided in the request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Clients of this service are expected to supply orderNumber as the identifier of the order for which payment has been completed. The service also supports the use of the Companion OID as the identifier. This is expected to be used primarily by the Companion Production Support Team.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="orderNumber" type="pcp:orderNumberType"/> <xsd:element name="orderIdentifier" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="amount" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount of the confirmed payment</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="confirmOrderPayment_1Response"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Orders related to the orderNumber provided in the request will resume processing. Successul Transcation is indicated by backendResponse element acceptStatus, Once its recieved success response is mapped in SOA.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="result" type="xcore:ServiceResultType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="type_outcome"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SUCCESSFUL/FAILURE</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESSFUL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FAILURE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="getOrderList"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The search is performed either on user's portalid, orange customer number or msisdn. In order to paginate the start position of the page and the page size needs to be provided to this operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="portalId" type="xcore:portalIDType"/> <xsd:element name="customerNumber" type="pcp:typeHorizonCustomerNumber"/> <xsd:element name="msisdn" type="xcore:msisdnType"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="isArchiveOrderRequired" type="mod:isArchiveOrderRequiredType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ordersSelectionCriteria" type="mod:ordersSelectionCriteriaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="getOrderList_2"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The search is performed either on user's portalid, orange customer number or msisdn. In order to paginate the start position of the page and the page size needs to be provided to this operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="portalRegisterationDetails" type="pcp:portalRegistationIdDetailsType"/> <xsd:element name="customerNumber" type="pcp:typeHorizonCustomerNumber"/> <xsd:element name="msisdn" type="xcore:msisdnType"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="isArchiveOrderRequired" type="mod:isArchiveOrderRequiredType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ordersSelectionCriteria" type="mod:ordersSelectionCriteriaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ordersSelectionCriteriaType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>In order to paginate the start position of the page and the page size needs to be provided to this operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="startOrderNumber" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Start position of the first page of results.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="numOrdersRequired" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Number of orders required to be retrieved.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="getOrderListResponse"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This operation must retrieve a list of orders if one or more orders are associated with the user portal id, orange customer number or msisdn (mobile phone number). The orders should be retrieved in a chronologically descending order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="totalOrders" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total number of orders found for the search critera.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ordersReturned" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Number of orders returned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="order" type="mod:orderSummaryType" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order List</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="getOrderList_2Response"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This operation must retrieve a list of orders if one or more orders are associated with the user portal id, orange customer number or msisdn (mobile phone number). The orders should be retrieved in a chronologically descending order. This operation will also return the early upgarde fee inclusive of the VAT incase paid for the order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="totalOrders" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total number of orders found for the search critera.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ordersReturned" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Number of orders returned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="order" type="mod:order_2SummaryType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order List</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="orderSummaryType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Order List</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="orderNumber" type="pcp:orderNumberType"/> <xsd:element name="orderId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="orderType" type="pcp:orderType"/> <xsd:element name="packageName" type="mod:packageName" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will be either the package name or the item name if the item was a stand-alone item (ie not part of a package). e.g. Nokia 6210 Football Special, Siemens C35i base etc.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orderDate" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date on which the order was placed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orderStatus" type="pcp:orderStatusType"/> <xsd:element name="returnsOutstanding" type="pcp:typeYesOrNo" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A flag indicating whether this order is an archive order or not.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="orderNumber" type="pcp:orderNumberType"/> <xsd:element name="orderId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="orderType" type="pcp:orderType"/> <xsd:element
